question: In which of the following sessions of Indian National Congress, Dadabhai Nouroji unfurled the flag of Swaraj for India?
explanation: In the year 1906, the Calcutta session of INC was held under the presidentship of Dadabhai Nouroji. the term \'Swaraj\' was used for the first time in that session. Resolutions on self-government, Swadeshi, boycott and national education were passed in that session.
